name: [DEMO- BxG]Seven days before Halloween
description:
Synopsis:

Lena was the best girlfriend you could have asked for. Or that's what you would like to believe. 

As Halloween drawing near and everyone was busy finding the best costume for the upcoming party, you can also slowly notice a different side of your girlfriend. Would you try discovering her secret or staying ignorant? And what would be your decision on that fated Halloween day?

The demo contains:

-8000+ words and lots of choices

-1 CG

-There is currently no sound yet.

Full game will have:

-around 20k words

-5 endings

-12+ CGs (10 CGs with variants already finished.)

-sound and CG gallery to be added.

Warning:  

-suggestive theme, stalking, drug use and other harmful behavior. 

-Violence, blood and death in full version

Team:

- Sprites, CG, BG arts, UI edit, script and coding by Saitoki 

-Editor Kusoneko 

This was originally a 2020 Spooktober Jam project that I had put on hold for a long time because this wasn't something I usually write. I decided to pick it up again for Yandere Jam. 

Most of the arts and outline were already done from 2020-2021, so all that was left was finishing writing the story and the last few drawings. I will try finishing this game fast then resume working on my other BL project.
